- **5th**

- **6th**
[Elemental Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=98)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55)) Lintwerth breathes a cloud of dust in a 15-foot cone that deals 6d6 slashing damage to each creature within the area (DC 30 basic Reflex save). The air in this area remains thick with dust for the next 4 rounds; while Lintwerth is in this area his fast healing functions normally, but other breathing creatures who end their turn in the area must make a DC 30 Fortitude save or become [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure) from coughing on the dusty air. Lintwerth can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
